title: Media Room: movie screen, terraced seating, and entertainment bar

posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 615 Sq.
Are you looking for apartments in Fremont, Seattle?
The Hayes on Stone Way offers a mix of modern studio, one-, and two-bedroom floor plans that fit your lifestyle and needs.
Each apartment is designed to fit your unique individuality.
The picturesque, modern exterior of our apartment building is combined with luxurious amenities inside each apartment.
Residents will also love our modern community amenities.
All of our apartment and community features are coupled with being in a fantastic location, within close proximity to local restaurants, parks, and shopping.
Contact us today to schedule a tour of our apartments in Fremont Seattle.

Energy efficient lighting including versatile track lighting systems custom configured to each floor plan, Stainless steel kitchen sinks with pull-out designer selected plumbing fixtures, Quartz slab countertops in kitchens and baths, Tall ceilings and large, operable windows, Several homes with west and south (Lake Union) facing views, 2 distinct and sophisticated color palette choices in appealing, modern tones, European style cabinets with brushed nickel hardware accents, Louver blinds, High-speed data wiring, Some units utilize sliding glass dividers for maximizing interior space, Many homes with private terraces, Efficiently designed and inviting floor plans with ample kitchen storage, Noise-absorbing, soft commercial vinyl plank floors paired with carpet in bedrooms, Energy Star rated Whirlpool appliances, including microwave, dishwasher and range/oven, and full-size washer and dryer in each home

Business Center with workspaces and whiteboards, Locally commissioned artwork, Bike storage, maintenance station, and bike wash area, Pet washroom, Luxer One package locker system with 24/7 secured access, 24-hour on-line concierge and management services, Street-level retail space, Media Room: movie screen, terraced seating, and entertainment bar, Game Room with bar, lounge area, community refrigerator, and shuffleboard, Acoustical sound engineered throughout the building, Controlled access entry system, Resident rooftop deck with spectacular views, bar seating areas, lounge chairs, heaters, BBQs, Outdoor TV, community garden, and fire pits, Fitness room loaded with professional-grade equipment
